overview:
BMS company specializes in the development of software systems for the management of Car Rental and Leasing companies.

BMS Car Rental System has been in use internationally since 1997 and benefits from more than 20 years of experience in the software business and in the car rental and leasing market.

The software has proven ability in managing small and large fleets (up to 50,000 vehicles) and the development team has vast knowledge and experience of the industry.

The BMS Software Main Modules:

  • Car Rental System
  • Vehicle Leasing System
  • Vehicles Ordering

  • Fleet Management

  • Sophisticated Pricing System

  • Customer Relationship Management
  • Work Orders and Invoices

  • Accidents and Damages System

  • Fuel Management System

  • Invoicing System
  • Traffic Tickets Management

  • Customer Complaints Management

  • Outbound Reservations

  • Car Sale
  • Reports and Queries
  • Interfaces with external systems
  • Control & Management Tools
